title: Robust PostgreSQL Database Architecture
desc: SteadyPlan uses PostgreSQL for data persistence. The schema is designed with proper relationships between users, projects, and tasks, ensuring data integrity and efficient queries. Connection pooling and prepared statements protect against SQL injection while maintaining performance.
img_caption: Well-structured database schema for optimal performance
p1: Clean table relationships prevent data redundancy
p3: Efficient joins for fast project retrieval

title: Secure Authentication & Role-Based Access
desc: A custom PHP authentication system manages user sessions with secure password hashing. Admin and standard user roles control access to features, ensuring that only authorized users can modify projects or manage team members.
img_caption: Secure login system with role-based access
p1: PHP session management with proper validation
p3: Add team members to projects by username

title: RESTful API Backend
desc: The backend exposes clean API endpoints for all CRUD operations on projects and tasks. JavaScript communicates asynchronously with PHP handlers, enabling smooth drag-and-drop Kanban updates without page reloads.
img_caption: Robust API design for seamless frontend integration
p1: Fetch API handles all data requests
p2: Create, read, update, delete for all entities

title: Adaptive UI with Theme Support
desc: SteadyPlan includes dark mode support via Bootstrap's theming system, reducing eye strain and offering user preference flexibility. The responsive design adapts to any screen size while maintaining a consistent experience.
img_caption: Dark mode and responsive design for optimal user experience
p1: Toggle between light and dark themes
p2: Works on desktop, tablet, and mobile
p3: Well thought-out layout for intuitive navigation
